data.comment: The match has started at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
In the minute 5, Reims have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Corner awarded to PSG.
Reims have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
In the minute 8, Xavier Chavalerin for Reims drives towards goal at Stade Auguste Delaune. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Mauro Icardi.
Kylian Mbappe with an assist there.
In the minute 12, PSG's Julian Draxler breaks free at Stade Auguste Delaune. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Reims have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to PSG.
In the minute 13, PSG surge into the attack at Stade Auguste Delaune but Mauro Icardiâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Reims at Stade Auguste Delaune.
In Reims PSG attack through Angel Di Maria. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 14, It's a goal kick for the home team in Reims.
Corner awarded to PSG.
In Reims, Mauro Icardi (PSG) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 18, Ruddy Buquet awards the home team a throw-in.
Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for PSG in their own half.
In the minute 24, Angel Di Maria for PSG gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ruddy Buquet awards Reims a goal kick.
Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
In the minute 26, Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
Ruddy Buquet awards Reims a goal kick.
Free kick PSG.
In the minute 31, It's a goal kick for the home team in Reims.
Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Reims drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 33, Throw-in Reims.
In Reims a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
In the minute 35, Moreto Cassama (Reims) has received a yellow card from Ruddy Buquet.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
PSG's Marquinhos is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 37, Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to PSG.
Neymar of PSG gets in a strike, but is off target.
Reims have a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for PSG in the half of Reims.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Throw-in for PSG close to the penalty box.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to PSG.
Goal kick for Reims at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Reims's Nathanael Mbuku gets in a shot on goal at Stade Auguste Delaune. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 43, PSG's Neymar gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
Goal kick for Reims at Stade Auguste Delaune.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Reims in the half of PSG.
Can PSG capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Reims's half?
The first-half has come to a close in Reims.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
PSG advance rapidly upfield but Ruddy Buquet blows for offside.
In the minute 49, Ball goes out of play for a PSG goal kick.
PSG pushes forward through Leandro Paredes, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Reims in the half of PSG.
In the minute 51, Julian Draxler for PSG has been booked by Ruddy Buquet and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for PSG in their own half.
Free kick PSG.
In the minute 57, The match at Stade Auguste Delaune has been interrupted briefly for a check on Neymar, who is down injured.
Ruddy Buquet waits before resuming play because El Bilal Toure for Reims is still down.
David Guion (Reims) is making a first substitution, with Boulaye Dia replacing Anastasios Donis.
In the minute 59, El Bilal Toure returns to the field for Reims after picking up a slight injury.
Neymar has recovered and rejoins the match in Reims.
Can PSG get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Reims's half?
In the minute 61, Boulaye Dia hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Reims!
PSG's Angel Di Maria breaks free at Stade Auguste Delaune. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Reims have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Nathanael Mbuku of Reims smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Goal! PSG extend their lead to 0-2 through Mauro Icardi.
Kylian Mbappe instrumental with a fine assist.
Ruddy Buquet signals a Reims throw-in in PSG's half.
In the minute 66, The home team replace Nathanael Mbuku with Arber Zeneli.
El Bilal Toure, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Dereck Kutesa is the substitute for Reims.
In the minute 67, In Reims PSG drive forward through Kylian Mbappe. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Reims are pushing forward but Boulaye Dia's finish is wide of the goal.
Ruddy Buquet awards PSG a goal kick.
In the minute 68, The away team have replaced Julian Draxler with Ander Herrera. This is the first substitution made today by Thomas Tuchel.
PSG make their second substitution with Marco Verratti replacing Leandro Paredes.
Corner awarded to Reims.
In the minute 70, Reims's Arber Zeneli gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Reims.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Reims.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Reims in their own half.
In Reims a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Thomas Foket (Reims) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 74, PSG attack but Marquinhos's header doesn't find the target.
Ruddy Buquet awards Reims a goal kick.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
In the minute 78, Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Kays Ruiz Atil is on a sub for Angel Di Maria for PSG.
Pablo Sarabia is replacing Mauro Icardi for the away team.
PSG awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ruddy Buquet signals a throw-in for Reims, close to PSG's area.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Reims at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Reims make their fourth substitution with Fraser Hornby replacing Moreto Cassama.
Kylian Mbappe for PSG gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 83, Reims have a goal kick.
Goal kick for PSG at Stade Auguste Delaune.
In the minute 85, PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
Abdou Diallo is on a sub for Presnel Kimpembe for PSG.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Reims.
Ball goes out of play for a PSG goal kick.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for PSG at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Free kick for PSG in their own half.
In Reims PSG attack through Pablo Sarabia. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 88, Ruddy Buquet awards Reims a goal kick.
PSG drives forward and Pablo Sarabia gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for PSG in their own half.
Reims have a goal kick.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Reims.
Reims will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from PSG.
PSG's Neymar gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Reims.
Goal kick for PSG at Stade Auguste Delaune.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Reims.
In Reims PSG attack through Pablo Sarabia. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Reims at Stade Auguste Delaune.
The match has come to a close in Reims. The final score is 0-2.
At Stade Auguste Delaune, Marquinhos has been yellow-carded for the away team.
